summary: Adds craftable unique Silver Swords to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Adds craftable unique silver swords to the game. Especially effective against the undead and lycanthropes. Needs steel smithing to craft and temper.

Version 3.0

One-Handed Sword

Base Damage: 11
Fire Damage: +20 [Long Charge Duration]

Two-Handed Sword

Base Damage: 20
Fire Damage: +20 [Long Charge Duration]

Crafting ingredients: Fire Salts,Silver Ingots,Leather strips

Install with NMM or manually place in Data folder.
author: falloutpc

files.name: Infernal Swords
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed enchantment not working ingame
changed tempering requirment to steel smithing
Changed fire salts requirement to 1
changed crafting requirement for the swords to 2 & 3 silver ingots
